title: We live in extraordinary times
excerpt: Electric cars. Reusable rockets. A supercomputer in your pocket.

children.text: Electric cars. Reusable rockets. A supercomputer in your pocket.
There’s never been a moment in our history as good as this. Nor a moment that warrants as much consternation.
Pandemics. Wars. Atmospheric Cancer. The next economic meltdown.
For sure, extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures.
But that doesn’t mean they’re any less extraordinary.
